overview:
A Rainmaker in the Call Center / BPO and Technology space with a focus on growth orientated companies in the global market. Deep experience in deployed CRM technology, SaaS and outsourcing. A highly leveraged sales hunter and specialist in channel optimization.

I’ve spent the last 19 years of my career as an executive and consultant, managing customer experiences in the Contact Centre / BPO industry. I continue to bring thought leadership to the strategy and sales side of this complex business globally for some of North Americas most recognized brands.
